pages.text: Certain devices require a large portion of Soul Energy, but are unable to directly take the energy from the Cursed Cage. After some experiments, you've discovered a way to have such devices siphon energies from multiple Cursed Cages instead of one. Such devices usually process faster the more Candlesticks and filled Cages are, usually usually 8 blocks, around it.
Placed one on top of a filled Cursed Cage.
